message: Let's start with a fair split. You can propose something better if you want!
You said it was a fair split, so I'm proposing a 50/50 split. Your turn!
I'm willing to compromise, but I need a bit more to account for the inflation. Can you meet me in the middle?
I'm willing to give you a bit more, but I need to prioritize my own gain. You're getting a smaller share this time.
